com.aevi.payment

Class AeviRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.helpers.BundleWrapper
      • com.aevi.payment.AeviRequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompletionRequest, FinancialRequest, ReversalRequest

    public abstract class AeviRequest
extends BundleWrapper
    Base class for the different request types. For specific requests, see PaymentRequest, RefundRequest, MoToPaymentRequest, MoToRefundRequest and ReversalRequest.

      • getEmailAddress

        public java.lang.String getEmailAddress()
        Gets the optional eMail address for the request. Can be set to null.
        Returns:
        eMail address. May be null.

      • setEmailAddress

        public AeviRequest setEmailAddress(java.lang.String emailAddress)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the eMail address for the request.
        Parameters:
        emailAddress - May be null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if an invalid eMail address is supplied.

      • setAccessibleMode

        public AeviRequest setAccessibleMode(boolean accessibleMode)
        Sets the accessibility mode flag for this request.
        Parameters:
        accessibleMode - True if accessible mode should be on for this transaction request

      • getAccessibleMode

        public boolean getAccessibleMode()
        Returns true if this transaction should be presented in the payment application using accessibility mode
        Returns:
        True if accessible mode should be enabled

      • addPrintPayloadForHeader

        public void addPrintPayloadForHeader(ReceiptType receiptTypes,
                            PaymentStatus paymentStatuses,
                            PrintPayload payload)
        Sets the print header information to be passed along with this request
        Parameters:
        receiptTypes - An ReceiptType indicating which type(s) of receipt that this information should be printed on
        paymentStatuses - An PaymentStatus indicating the status(es) which should be used to decided if this is present on the receipt type
        payload - PrintPayload the print header information to add to the receipt
        See Also:
        PaymentAppConfiguration.canPrintCombinedReceipt()

      • addPrintPayloadForFooter

        public void addPrintPayloadForFooter(ReceiptType receiptTypes,
                            PaymentStatus paymentStatuses,
                            PrintPayload payload)
        Sets the print footer information to be passed along with this request
        Parameters:
        receiptTypes - An ReceiptType indicating which type(s) of receipt that this information should be printed on
        paymentStatuses - An PaymentStatus indicating the status(es) which should be used to decided if this is present on the receipt type
        payload - PrintPayload the print footer information to add to the receipt
        See Also:
        PaymentAppConfiguration.canPrintCombinedReceipt()

      • hasPrintPayloadForHeader

        public boolean hasPrintPayloadForHeader(ReceiptType receiptType,
                               PaymentStatus paymentStatus)
        Returns true if this request contains print header information
        Parameters:
        receiptType - An enum indicating which type of receipt that this information should be printed on
        paymentStatus - An enum indicating the statuses which should be used to decided if this is present on the receipt type
        Returns:
        true if this request contains an extra print header

        paymentStatus - An enum indicating the statuses which should be used to decided if this is present on the receipt type
        Returns:
        true if this request contains an extra print footer

      • getPrintPayloadForHeader

        public PrintPayload getPrintPayloadForHeader(ReceiptType receiptType,
                                    PaymentStatus paymentStatus)
        Returns the PrintPayload data for the given position if any has been set. Usually this method is only used by the payment application
        Parameters:
        receiptType - An enum indicating which type of receipt that this information should be printed on
        paymentStatus - An enum indicating the statuses which should be used to decided if this is present on the receipt type
        Returns:
        The PrintPayload object if one has been set for this receipt position
        Throws:
        AeviRequestDataMissingException - if no data has been set

      • getPrintPayloadForFooter

        public PrintPayload getPrintPayloadForFooter(ReceiptType receiptType,
                                    PaymentStatus paymentStatus)
        Returns the PrintPayload data for the given position if any has been set. Usually this method is only used by the payment application
        Parameters:
        receiptType - An enum indicating which type of receipt that this information should be printed on
        paymentStatus - An enum indicating the statuses which should be used to decided if this is present on the receipt type
        Returns:
        The PrintPayload object if one has been set for this receipt position
        Throws:
        AeviRequestDataMissingException - if no data has been set

      • getPrintPayloadForBasket

        public PrintPayload getPrintPayloadForBasket(ReceiptType receiptType,
                                    PaymentStatus paymentStatus)

        Returns:

      • createIntent

        public android.content.Intent createIntent()
        Creates an Intent that can be used to launch the payment application.
        Returns:
        an Intent that can be used to launch the payment application.

      • addToIntent

        public void addToIntent(android.content.Intent intent)
        Adds the request to an Intent as an extra.
        Parameters:
        intent - intent to add the payment request to.

      • fromIntent

        public static AeviRequest fromIntent(android.content.Intent intent)
        Builds a AeviRequest sub class from the given request. If no valid request type can be found from the Intent's extras, a AeviRequestDataMissingException exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        intent - the intent. This parameter must not be null.
        Returns:
        The AeviRequest found in the given Intent.
        Throws:
        AeviRequestDataMissingException - when the Intent cannot be converted into a valid request type

      • createPaymentRequestIntent

        public static android.content.Intent createPaymentRequestIntent()
        Creates an Intent that can be used to perform a payment Request.
        Returns:
        an Intent for payment Request
